Headline: Normal Brown Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Normal service on the Brown Line is resuming following an earlier loss of track power near Merchandise Mart.   Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Normal service on the Brown Line is resuming following an earlier loss of track power near Merchandise Mart.  

All trains resume normal stops at Merchandise Mart.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Med. District. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
